text: right The Compleat Adventurer is a 1983 role-playing game supplement for published by Bard Games. ==Contents== The Compleat Adventurer is a collection of character classes for fantasy roleplaying games. ==Reception== Craig Sheeley reviewed The Compleat Adventurer in Space Gamer No. 72. Sheeley commented that "The Compleat Adventurer is rather expensive for the information therein, though the thirteen character classes are quite good and very workable." ==References== Category:Fantasy role-playing game supplements
title: The Compleat Adventurer
